verses.verse: And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H6440>unto<s%> <S%H477>Elisha<s%>, Behold now, the <S%H4725>place<s%> where we <S%H3427>dwell<s%> with thee is too <S%H6862>strait<s%> for us.

Let us <S%H3212>go<s%>, we pray thee, unto <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, and <S%H3947>take<s%> thence every <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H259>a<s%> <S%H6982>beam<s%>, and let us <S%H6213>make<s%> us a <S%H4725>place<s%> there, where we may <S%H3427>dwell<s%>. And he <S%H559>answered<s%>, <S%H3212>Go<s%> ye.
And <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Be <S%H2974>content<s%>, I pray thee, and <S%H3212>go<s%> with thy <S%H5650>servants<s%>. And he <S%H559>answered<s%>, I will <S%H3212>go<s%>.
So he <S%H3212>went<s%> with them. And when they <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, they cut <S%H1504>down<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%>.

But as <S%H259>one<s%> was <S%H5307>felling<s%> a <S%H6982>beam<s%>, the axe <S%H1270>head<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> into the <S%H4325>water<s%>: and he <S%H6817>cried<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H162>Alas<s%>, <S%H113>master<s%>! for it was <S%H7592>borrowed<s%>.

And the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H575>Where<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> it? And he <S%H7200>shewed<s%> him the <S%H4725>place<s%>. And he cut <S%H7094>down<s%> a <S%H6086>stick<s%>, and <S%H7993>cast<s%> it in thither; and the <S%H1270>iron<s%> did <S%H6687>swim<s%>.
Therefore <S%H559>said<s%> he, Take it <S%H7311>up<s%> to thee. And he put <S%H7971>out<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and <S%H3947>took<s%> it.

¶ Then the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H758>Syria<s%> <S%H3898>warred<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and took <S%H3289>counsel<s%> with his <S%H5650>servants<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, In <S%H6423>such<s%> and <S%H492>such<s%> a <S%H4725>place<s%> shall be my <S%H8466>camp<s%>.

And the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> unto the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H8104>Beware<s%> that thou <S%H5674>pass<s%> not <S%H2088>such<s%> a <S%H4725>place<s%>; for thither the <S%H758>Syrians<s%> are come <S%H5185>down<s%>.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> to the <S%H4725>place<s%> which the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>told<s%> him and <S%H2094>warned<s%> him of, and <S%H8104>saved<s%> himself there, not <S%H259>once<s%> nor <S%H8147>twice<s%>.

Therefore the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H758>Syria<s%> was sore <S%H5590>troubled<s%> for this <S%H1697>thing<s%>; and he <S%H7121>called<s%> his <S%H5650>servants<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, Will ye not <S%H5046>shew<s%> me which of us is for the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>?

And <S%H259>one<s%> of his <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, None, my <S%H113>lord<s%>, O <S%H4428>king<s%>: but <S%H477>Elisha<s%>, the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> that is in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H5046>telleth<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> that thou <S%H1696>speakest<s%> in thy <S%H2315%H4904>bedchamber<s%>.

¶ And he <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H3212>Go<s%> and <S%H7200>spy<s%> <S%H351>where<s%> he is, that I may <S%H7971>send<s%> and <S%H3947>fetch<s%> him. And it was <S%H5046>told<s%> him, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Behold, he is in <S%H1886>Dothan<s%>.

Therefore <S%H7971>sent<s%> he thither <S%H5483>horses<s%>, and <S%H7393>chariots<s%>, and a <S%H3515>great<s%> <S%H2428>host<s%>: and they <S%H935>came<s%> by <S%H3915>night<s%>, and <S%H5362>compassed<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H5362>about<s%>.

And when the <S%H8334>servant<s%> of the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> was <S%H6965>risen<s%> <S%H7925>early<s%>, and gone <S%H3318>forth<s%>, behold, an <S%H2428>host<s%> <S%H5437>compassed<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> both with <S%H5483>horses<s%> and <S%H7393>chariots<s%>. And his <S%H5288>servant<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, <S%H162>Alas<s%>, my <S%H113>master<s%>! how shall we <S%H6213>do<s%>?
And he <S%H559>answered<s%>, <S%H3372>Fear<s%> not: for they that be with us are <S%H7227>more<s%> than they that be with them.

And <S%H477>Elisha<s%> <S%H6419>prayed<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, I pray thee, <S%H6491>open<s%> his <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, that he may <S%H7200>see<s%>. And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6491>opened<s%> the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the young <S%H5288>man<s%>; and he <S%H7200>saw<s%>: and, behold, the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> was <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H5483>horses<s%> and <S%H7393>chariots<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> <S%H477>Elisha<s%>.

And when they came <S%H3381>down<s%> to him, <S%H477>Elisha<s%> <S%H6419>prayed<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H5221>Smite<s%> this <S%H1471>people<s%>, I pray thee, with <S%H5575>blindness<s%>. And he <S%H5221>smote<s%> them with <S%H5575>blindness<s%> according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H477>Elisha<s%>.

¶ And <S%H477>Elisha<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, This is not the <S%H1870>way<s%>, neither is <S%H2090>this<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%>: <S%H3212%H310>follow<s%> me, and I will <S%H3212>bring<s%> you to the <S%H376>man<s%> whom ye <S%H1245>seek<s%>. But he <S%H3212>led<s%> them to <S%H8111>Samaria<s%>.

And it came to pass, when they were <S%H935>come<s%> into <S%H8111>Samaria<s%>, that <S%H477>Elisha<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, <S%H6491>open<s%> the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of these men, that they may <S%H7200>see<s%>. And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6491>opened<s%> their <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, and they <S%H7200>saw<s%>; and, behold, they were in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria<s%>.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H477>Elisha<s%>, when he <S%H7200>saw<s%> them, My <S%H1>father<s%>, shall I <S%H5221>smite<s%> them? shall I <S%H5221>smite<s%> them?

And he <S%H559>answered<s%>, Thou shalt not <S%H5221>smite<s%> them: wouldest thou <S%H5221>smite<s%> those whom thou hast taken <S%H7617>captive<s%> with thy <S%H2719>sword<s%> and with thy <S%H7198>bow<s%>? <S%H7760>set<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> and <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them, that they may <S%H398>eat<s%> and <S%H8354>drink<s%>, and <S%H3212>go<s%> to their <S%H113>master<s%>.

And he <S%H3739>prepared<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3740>provision<s%> for them: and when they had <S%H398>eaten<s%> and <S%H8354>drunk<s%>, he sent them <S%H7971>away<s%>, and they <S%H3212>went<s%> to their <S%H113>master<s%>. So the <S%H1416>bands<s%> of <S%H758>Syria<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> no <S%H3254>more<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

¶ And it came to pass after <S%H310>this<s%>, that <S%H1130>Ben-hadad<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H758>Syria<s%> <S%H6908>gathered<s%> all his <S%H4264>host<s%>, and went <S%H5927>up<s%>, and <S%H6696>besieged<s%> <S%H8111>Samaria<s%>.

And there was a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7458>famine<s%> in <S%H8111>Samaria<s%>: and, behold, they <S%H6696>besieged<s%> it, until an <S%H2543>ass's<s%> <S%H7218>head<s%> was sold for <S%H8084>fourscore<s%> pieces of <S%H3701>silver<s%>, and the fourth <S%H7255>part<s%> of a <S%H6894>cab<s%> of dove's <S%H1686%H3123%H2755>dung<s%> for <S%H2568>five<s%> pieces of <S%H3701>silver<s%>.

And as the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> was passing <S%H5674>by<s%> upon the <S%H2346>wall<s%>, there <S%H6817>cried<s%> a <S%H802>woman<s%> unto him, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H3467>Help<s%>, my <S%H113>lord<s%>, O <S%H4428>king<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, If the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> do not <S%H3467>help<s%> thee, <S%H370>whence<s%> shall I <S%H3467>help<s%> thee? out of the <S%H1637>barnfloor<s%>, or out of the <S%H3342>winepress<s%>?

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto her, What aileth thee? And she <S%H559>answered<s%>, This <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto me, <S%H5414>Give<s%> thy <S%H1121>son<s%>, that we may <S%H398>eat<s%> him to <S%H3117>day<s%>, and we will <S%H398>eat<s%> my <S%H1121>son<s%> to <S%H4279>morrow<s%>.

So we <S%H1310>boiled<s%> my <S%H1121>son<s%>, and did <S%H398>eat<s%> him: and I <S%H559>said<s%> unto her on the <S%H312>next<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>, <S%H5414>Give<s%> thy <S%H1121>son<s%>, that we may <S%H398>eat<s%> him: and she hath <S%H2244>hid<s%> her <S%H1121>son<s%>.

¶ And it came to pass, when the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H802>woman<s%>, that he <S%H7167>rent<s%> his <S%H899>clothes<s%>; and he passed <S%H5674>by<s%> upon the <S%H2346>wall<s%>, and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7200>looked<s%>, and, behold, he had <S%H8242>sackcloth<s%> <S%H1004>within<s%> upon his <S%H1320>flesh<s%>.

Then he <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> so and <S%H3254>more<s%> also to me, if the <S%H7218>head<s%> of <S%H477>Elisha<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8202>Shaphat<s%> shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> on him this <S%H3117>day<s%>.

But <S%H477>Elisha<s%> <S%H3427>sat<s%> in his <S%H1004>house<s%>, and the <S%H2205>elders<s%> <S%H3427>sat<s%> with him; and the king <S%H7971>sent<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> him: but ere the <S%H4397>messenger<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to him, he <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H2205>elders<s%>, <S%H7200>See<s%> ye how this <S%H1121>son<s%> of a <S%H7523>murderer<s%> hath <S%H7971>sent<s%> to take <S%H5493>away<s%> mine <S%H7218>head<s%>? <S%H7200>look<s%>, when the <S%H4397>messenger<s%> <S%H935>cometh<s%>, <S%H5462>shut<s%> the <S%H1817>door<s%>, and hold him <S%H3905>fast<s%> at the <S%H1817>door<s%>: is not the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of his <S%H113>master's<s%> <S%H7272>feet<s%> <S%H310>behind<s%> him?

And while he yet <S%H1696>talked<s%> with them, behold, the <S%H4397>messenger<s%> came <S%H3381>down<s%> unto him: and he <S%H559>said<s%>, Behold, this <S%H7451>evil<s%> is of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; what should I <S%H3176>wait<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> any longer?
